criteria: >80% unit test coverage; All integration tests passing; CI/CD pipeline successfully deploys to staging; No P0/P1 bugs.
success_metrics: All sprint goal deliverables are verified and functional in staging.

criteria: Product CRUD E2E tests passing; Compliance job E2E test passing; Security scan clean.
success_metrics: Manual product management is fully functional and compliance automation is verified.

criteria: Bulk import of 1000-row CSV completes under 2 minutes; Inventory check API P95 latency < 50ms; No performance regressions on existing APIs.
success_metrics: Bulk import feature is performant and reliable.

criteria: Bulk export E2E tests passing; CLI transformation script passes UAT with the Onboarding Team; Admin validation APIs are confirmed functional.
success_metrics: All internal and external vendor tools are delivered and meet business requirements.
